RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 1 1M 70Y Turf CR: 88. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 19000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $16,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000 AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since August 21 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since July 21 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) Preference to horses with the most starts at Pen n National since May31st 2022. (If deemed inadvisable by management to run this race over the turf course, it will be run on the main track at One Mile Seventy Yards.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RECONVENE broke outwardly at the start, settled back early, advanced on the turn four wide, came five wide into the lane, closed full of run to draw away late to prove best, driving. GALILEE was settled back early, made a four wide move on the turn, then made a bid in the drive, gained a short lead in the furlong grounds but could not go with the winner, second best. LA PAZ was hard held early on the inside, tipped out leaving the turn and had no late kick, held show award. RECYCLE vied for the lead three wide, made a two wide bid to shake clear on the turn, but faded late. LUCKY RUNNING CAT ]was allowed to settle on the inside, advanced three wide by the quarter pole, angled in to be on the inside by the furlong marker but then was blocked leaving the sixteenth marker losing all chance. CITY OF GOD was four wide into the first turn, tracked the pace three wide and weakened. JACK SLYE was settled two wide and lacked a rally. GRAEL was reserved early, advanced four wide on the turn and came wide and lacked a late response. WARRIOR'S CAUSE vied for the lead on the inside and gave way. HELLMAN was three wide into the first turn and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Grael
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, 4 wide turn, came wide, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: La Paz
ENTRY.COMMENT: hard held inside early, tipped 3 wide, held 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Running Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle inside, 3 wide 1/4 pole, angled in,blocked 1/16

ENTRY.NAME: Jack Slye
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle 2 wide, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: Warrior's Cause
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead inside, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Galilee
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled back, 4 wide move turn, bid, led, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Recycle
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 3 wide, bid 2 wide, shook clear, faded 1/8

ENTRY.NAME: City of God
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4 wide first turn, tracked pace 3 wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Hellman
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3 wide first turn, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Reconvene
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke outwardly, settled back, advanced turn, came 5 wide, closed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 2 1M 70Y Turf CR: 82. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 18000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $16,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000 AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non -winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since August 21 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) Preference to horses with the most starts at Penn National since May 31st 2022. (If deemed in advisable by management to run this race over the turf course, it will be run on the main track at One Mile Seventy Yards.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROAN FOR THE ROSE was rated early, four to three wide, then came four wide into the lane, closed well to get up in time to prove best, driving. GETTIN'DOWNONIT was bumped at the start, then vied for the lead three wide, made a two wide bid leaving the quarter pole and was clear by the furlong marker, but was denied on the wire to miss. MACHO HONCHO was reserved early, inside on the turn, angled out nearing the furlong marker and rallied well late. MISCHIEF WARRIOR tracked the pace three to two wide, came three wide into the lane and finished willingly but needed more. MORNING MARCH tracked the pace along the inside but lacked the needed closing kick. I LUCKED OUT set a fast pace on the inside, was headed on the turn, angled off the inside by the furlong marker and faded. PROPHETS VOICE (IRE) was reserved early, three wide on the turn and had no rally. RIVERBOAT BANDIT was unprepared at the start, not a factor. RUNAHOLIC was settled early, between rivals by the three eighths marker and weakened. FIGHTNOMOREFOREVER failed to menace.

ENTRY.NAME: Morning March
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace inside, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Macho Honcho
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, inside turn, angled out, rallied outside

ENTRY.NAME: Fightnomoreforever
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: I Lucked Out
ENTRY.COMMENT: set fast pace inside, angled out 1/8, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Roan for the Rose
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated 4-3 wide, came 4 wide upper stretch, closed, up in time

ENTRY.NAME: Prophets Voice (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, 3 wide turn, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Gettin'downonit
ENTRY.OWNER: Port Lairge Stables and Stevenson Louisa
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, vied 3 wide, bid 2 wide, drew clear 1/8, denied

ENTRY.NAME: Mischief Warrior
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace 2-3 wide, came 3 wide, gaining, needed more

ENTRY.NAME: Runaholic
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, between 3/8, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Riverboat Bandit
ENTRY.COMMENT: unprepared start, no factor,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 3 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 91. Allowance Purse 31600. FOR REGISTERED PA-BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A PA-RESTRICTED RACE(S) OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since August 21 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since July 21 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $16,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JUMP FOR THE WIN pressed the pace and made a two wide bid to duel for command on the turn, then kicked clear in the final furlong to prove best under a drive. BESTSUGARDADDYEVER was rated between rivals, made a four wide bid off the turn and finished willingly to be clearly second best. NOSTALGIC RUN set a pressured pace and then dueled for the lead on the inside and weakened the final furlong, bested rest. SKIMBLE SHANKS tracked the pace on the inside and weakened. SPENDOLINI tracked the pace on the outside and tired. REBEL RULER failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: Skimble Shanks
ENTRY.OWNER: Rock Bottom Ranch and Warrior's Reward LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace inside, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Bestsugardaddyever
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated between horses, came 4 wide, willingly, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Nostalgic Run
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead inside, dueled inside, weakened, bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: Jump for the Win
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, bid 2 wide, drew clear, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Rebel Ruler
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Spendolini
ENTRY.OWNER: Morrone Stephen E Kimball Dan and Spendolini John
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace outside, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 66. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 18000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $16,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000 AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 21 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SWEET BEAUTY vied for the lead between rivals, then made a inside bid leaving the turn, then edged clear in the furlong ground grounds to prove best, driving. STEPHANIE MY LOVE vied for the lead outside, made a three wide bid on the turn to shake clear, then was headed by the furlong marker, could not go with the winner while staying on for the place award. KAZ MUSIC tracked the pace on the inside, two wide by the quarter pole, then had a mild rally to gain the show award late. LONDON LADY was rated early three wide, made a three wide move on the turn but flattened out, lost show award late. LET'S GO MO was bumped at the start, three wide by the quarter pole and had no rally. TRECHMO GIRL was settled on the inside and had no rally. RIGHTOFFTHEBENCH was reserved early, four wide by the quarter pole and was not a threat. UPTOWN SERAPHINA vied for the lead on the inside and faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Kaz Music
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace inside, 2 wide 1/4 pole, got show late

ENTRY.NAME: Uptown Seraphina
ENTRY.OWNER: Strunk John L Strunk Theresa A Baxter Ted R and Baxter Susan G
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead inside, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Trechmo Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled inside, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Let's Go Mo
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, settled back, 3 wide 1/4 pole, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: London Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated 3 wide, bid 3 wide, flattened out, lost 3rd late

ENTRY.NAME: Rightoffthebench
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, 4 wide 1/4 pole, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Beauty
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied between horses, bid inside, edged clear, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Stephanie My Love
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied outside, bid 3 wide, drew clear, headed 1/8, 2nd best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 93. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 28900. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR PENNSYLVANIA BRED OR CLAIMING PRICE $25,000 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-win ners Of A Race Since August 21 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since July 21 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Races Where Entered For $25,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BOURBON MUSIC pressed the pace and made a two wide bid on the turn, took over leaving the turn and drew clear to prove best, driving. EAGLES CRY tracked the pace two wide, came three wide into the lane and finished willingly to be second best. DOWNTOWNCHALYBROWN set a pressured pace on the inside, then dueled with the winner and faded in the drive, bested rest. JEOPARDY JAMES was settled three wide, came four wide into the lane and had no kick. YES IT'S ROO was settled early on the inside, shifted out and was five wide by the quarter pole and improved position late. JOKER BOY was away alertly, chased the pace two wide and had no rally, even effort. KILIMANJARA tracked the pace on the inside and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Downtownchalybrown
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, dueled turn, faded stretch,bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: Kilimanjara
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace inside, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Eagles Cry
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace 2 wide, came 3 wide, willingly, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Bourbon Music
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 2 wide, bid 2 wide, drew clear, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Yes It's Roo
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled inside, shift out, 5 wide 1/4 pole, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Jeopardy James
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled 3 wide, advanced 3 wide turn, came 4 wide, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Joker Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, chased pace 2 wide, no rally,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 57. Claiming Purse 10800. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 21 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BUSTIN DOWN DOORS was rated early and made a four wide move on the turn, took over leaving the three sixteenths and drew clear to prove best under a drive. SAVE GRACE was allowed to settle on the inside, advanced three wide by the quarter pole, angled in by the three sixteenths and finished well, second best. COSMOLOGICAL prompted the pace and made a three wide bid on the turn to vie for command by the quarter pole, then weakened the final furlong, bested rest. MADI'S TUNE set a pressured pace on the inside and weakened. SIMPLE JUSTICE lacked a rally. IOANNA pressed the pace two wide and weakened. UNCAPTURED GRACE showed little.

ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace 3 wide, bid 3 wide, weakened 1/8, best rest

ENTRY.COMMENT: showed little,

ENTRY.OWNER: Ioia Joseph Ioia Gayle and Spina Chuck

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 7 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 10800. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE MARCH 21. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since August 21 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LAKE NAKURU was allowed to settle early, made a four wide move on the turn and took over off the turn, then was clear by the furlong marker, but was tired late and held on being saved by the wire to prove best, driving. DEVOTED KITTEN was settled back early, came six wide into the lane and closed fast late to just miss. WARRIOR IN CHIEF was four wide into the first turn, set the fast pace towards the inside, was headed by the five sixteenths, then fell off the pace leaving the turn, but was resurgent late to be gaining late but missed. ARISTOCAT pressed the pace three wide, made a three wide bid on the turn to vie for command, but faded in the drive. DIGGERS DIAMOND was reserved early, swung out five wide leaving the turn and had a mild late rally but needed more. VISHNU was off a step slow, then made a inside middle move on the backstretch but lacked a late kick. SAMARONTI was allowed to settle early, came wide into the lane and had no rally. C C'S WARRIOR was well placed on the inside and tired in the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Aristocat
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 3 wide, bid 3 wide, faded stretch,

ENTRY.NAME: Samaronti
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, came wide upper stretch, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Diggers Diamond
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, swung 5 wide, needed more

ENTRY.NAME: Vishnu
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, middle move inside, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Warrior in Chief
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4 wide first turn, set fast pace inside, headed turn, came again

ENTRY.NAME: Lake Nakuru
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 4 wide move, led 3/16, held on, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: C C's Warrior
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed inside, tired stretch,

ENTRY.NAME: Devoted Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled back, came 6 wide upper stretch, closed fast, missed
